最近的天气变得很反常.Translation: The recent weather has become extremely abnormal

明明才刚入春，秩序之庭的空气却格外炎热.Translation: Though spring has just begun, the air in the Court of Order is unusually hot

死去的尸体居然莫名奇妙的爬了起来变成了行尸走肉.Translation: The dead corpses inexplicably rose up and turned into walking dead

A：有一位叫巴托莉的魔法使说她知道发生这一切的原因.Translation: A: A mage named Bartoli claims she knows the cause of all this

A：但是貌似以她的力量还不足以解决问题，所以需要我们的帮助.Translation: A: But it seems her power alone isn't enough to resolve this, so she needs our help

B：那走吧，去看看什么情况，我要热死了.Translation: B: Let's go check it out then, I'm dying of heat

来自地狱的恶魔毕托鲁已经苏醒.Translation: The demon Bitoru from hell has awakened

巴托莉：各个区域的季节都乱套了，夏蝉冬鸣，春笋秋生.Translation: Bartoli: The seasons across all regions are in chaos - summer cicadas cry in winter, spring bamboo shoots grow in autumn

巴托莉：根据我的调查，这一切都是有人在幕后操控.Translation: Bartoli: My investigation shows someone is pulling strings behind the scenes

巴托莉：TA们过于强大，我一个人应付不过来.Translation: Bartoli: They're too powerful for me to handle alone

巴托莉：所以，我需要你们的帮助.Translation: Bartoli: Therefore, I need your help

巴托莉：你们应该也受够了这几天的鬼天气，不是吗.Translation: Bartoli: You must be tired of this bizarre weather too, aren't you?

巴托莉：名为四季之力的武器能够吸收四个季节的力量，有了它解决这场异变不是问题.Translation: Bartoli: The weapon called Four Seasons Power can absorb seasonal energies. With it, resolving this anomaly won't be an issue

Player has picked up the Light.Translation: Player has picked up the Light

她是使用冰气魔法的强大魔法使.Translation: She's a powerful mage specialising in ice magic

Player has picked up the Dark.Translation: Player has picked up the Dark

巴托莉：看到远处的那座尖塔了吗？.Translation: Bartoli: See that spire in the distance?

巴托莉：那里有强烈且混乱的能量反应，靠近它我都感觉到我的寒冰在消融.Translation: Bartoli: There's intense chaotic energy there - I can feel my ice melting just approaching it

巴托莉：我打赌这场异变的罪魁祸首一定藏在哪里！.Translation: Bartoli: I bet the mastermind behind this anomaly is hiding there!

巴托莉已经准备好使用极冰长枪了.Translation: Bartoli is ready to use her Extreme Ice Lance

A：让我看看，这里写了什么，嗯…….Translation: A: Let me see... what's written here... hmm...

A：生命之色涡旋流转，七重之门现于世间，力量之塔君临九天…………太棒了我逐渐理.Translation: A: 'The colour of life swirls, seven gates manifest, the Tower of Power reigns supreme'... Amazing! I'm starting to understand everything!!!

B：你别特么看了。这些尸体都快压不住了.Translation: B: Stop freaking reading! We can barely hold back these zombies

这里看起来在进行某种仪式，上方的能量很混乱.Translation: Some sort of ritual seems to be happening here, with chaotic energy above

巴托莉：我之前远远的见到过一个人进入了这了，TA似乎就是我们要解决的家伙.Translation: Bartoli: I saw someone enter here earlier from afar - they're likely our target

巴托莉：不管怎么说，先到上面看看是什么情况吧.Translation: Bartoli: Regardless, let's go up and investigate

巴托莉：好的……让我看看，真不容易…….Translation: Bartoli: Alright... let me see... this isn't easy...

???：是你……手下败将居然还敢来作乱.Translation: ???: You... how dare a defeated foe return to cause trouble

???：竟敢破坏净化仪式，不可饶恕.Translation: ???: How dare you disrupt the purification ritual - unforgivable

索尼娅：吾名索尼娅，你们都该死.Translation: Sonia: I am Sonia - you all deserve death

巴托莉：秩序之庭的大人们，她就交给你们了.Translation: Bartoli: Lords of the Court, I leave her to you

索尼娅：你们为什么要夺走春之力？.Translation: Sonia: Why are you stealing Spring's power?

索尼娅：这些死尸……我明白了，我要回去告诉姐姐…….Translation: Sonia: These zombies... I understand. I must tell my sister...

巴托莉：被她跑了吗？没关系秩序者，我们已经得到了春之力.Translation: Bartoli: She escaped? No matter, we've obtained Spring's power

巴托莉：让我引导这里的能量带我们出去吧，这需要一点时间.Translation: Bartoli: Let me channel the energy here to get us out - this will take some time

来自异世界的拉弥亚似乎对这场异变很感兴趣.Translation: Lamia from another world seems interested in this anomaly

春之力已固定，你可以在后续关卡继续使用…….Translation: Spring Power stabilized - you can continue using it...

Player has picked up the Water.Translation: Player has picked up the Water

Player has picked up the Fire.Translation: Player has picked up the Fire

Player has picked up the Season Power.Translation: Player has picked up the Season Power

Player has picked up the Earth.Translation: Player has picked up the Earth

巴托莉：应该就是这里了，到上面去，我可以尝试破坏这里的仪式.Translation: Bartoli: This must be the place. Let's go up - I'll try disrupting the ritual

巴托莉：不愧是秩序者，轻易就办到了我做不到的事呢.Translation: Bartoli: Truly Orderkeepers - easily accomplishing what I couldn't

巴托莉：让我想想，接下来应该去……迷途林.Translation: Bartoli: Let me think... next we should go to... Lost Woods

巴托莉：我曾在那里感受到了无序的夏之力.Translation: Bartoli: I sensed chaotic Summer power there

巴托莉：穿过这串长长的隧道应该就快到了.Translation: Bartoli: Through this long tunnel and we'll arrive

A：但是这些死尸也一直跟着我们.Translation: A: But these zombies keep following us

B：老大。这不成问题，我来断后.Translation: B: Boss. Not a problem - I'll cover the rear

巴托莉：这里充满了浓郁的夏之力.Translation: Bartoli: This place is saturated with Summer's power

巴托莉：不过看起来想要继续前进，还需要一点身手.Translation: Bartoli: Though continuing forward will require some physical prowess

A：交给我吧，我一天1000个俯卧撑不是问题.Translation: A: Leave it to me - 1000 pushups a day is no problem

？？？：看来，你们就是索尼娅说的别有所图之人.Translation: ???: So you're the ones Sonia mentioned with ulterior motives

？？？：离开吧，人类，趁我改变主意之前.Translation: ???: Leave, humans, before I change my mind

？？？：这样吗？那我不介意用仪式残留的力量来消灭你们这些蝼蚁.Translation: ???: Is that so? Then I'll use the ritual's residual power to eliminate you insects

？？？：这里已经安全，如果你们还要生事，就别怪我无情了.Translation: ???: This place is secure now. Cause more trouble and I won't hold back

夏之力已固定，你可以在后续关卡继续使用…….Translation: Summer Power stabilized - you can continue using it...

A：看起来我们已经获得了两个季节的力量.Translation: A: Seems we've obtained two seasonal powers

A：她为什么在最后留手了？.Translation: A: Why did she hold back at the end?

巴托莉：或许她良心发现？又或者是制造混乱消耗了太多？.Translation: Bartoli: Maybe she had a change of heart? Or creating chaos exhausted her?

巴托莉：别管那么多了，我们离成功不远了.Translation: Bartoli: Nevermind that - we're close to success

巴托莉：秋之力集中的地方我已经找到了，事不宜迟，赶紧动身吧.Translation: Bartoli: I've located Autumn's power concentration - let's move quickly

B：没问题，队长只负责带队就好了，我们队员考虑的就多了.Translation: B: No problem - captain just leads, we members handle the rest

巴托莉：据我所知，这里不仅仅蕴含大量的秋之力.Translation: Bartoli: From what I know, this place holds more than just Autumn's power

巴托莉：之前制造混乱的索尼娅也在这里，让异变持续.Translation: Bartoli: The chaos-maker Sonia is here too, sustaining the anomaly

巴托莉：乘胜追击是最明智的选择.Translation: Bartoli: Pressing our advantage is the wisest choice

根据提示按下正确的魔法阵.Translation: Press the correct magic circles as indicated

做得好，结界很快就会消失.Translation: Well done - the barrier will soon dissipate

巴托莉：我能感受到，她就在这里.Translation: Bartoli: I can sense her here

巴托莉：很好，给我点时间，让我找到她藏身的空间.Translation: Bartoli: Good - give me time to find her hidden space

索尼娅：你们居然敢闯入我的空间.Translation: Sonia: You dare invade my domain

索尼娅：来的正好，该一雪前耻了.Translation: Sonia: Perfect timing - time to redeem my honor

索尼娅：都给我下地狱吧！！！.Translation: Sonia: All of you go to hell!!!

星符 [波与粒子的境界].Translation: Star Sigil [Realm of Waves and Particles]

巴托莉：干的漂亮，秩序者，我们击败了她！.Translation: Bartoli: Well done, Orderkeepers! We've defeated her!

巴托莉：该离开这里了，带着秋之力一起.Translation: Bartoli: Time to leave - with Autumn's power

巴托莉：她已经疯了，什么都做的出来，当务之急是离开.Translation: Bartoli: She's gone mad - our priority is to escape

巴托莉：走！前面就是传送门，我们准备撤.Translation: Bartoli: Go! The portal's ahead - prepare to withdraw

索尼娅：如果秋之力也流失的话…….Translation: Sonia: If Autumn's power also drains...

秋之力已固定，你可以在后续关卡继续使用…….Translation: Autumn Power stabilized - you can continue using it...

巴托莉：太好了，各位秩序之庭的大人们.Translation: Bartoli: Excellent, lords of the Court

巴托莉：还剩冬的力量，这次的异变就能完美解决了.Translation: Bartoli: Just Winter's power remains to fully resolve this anomaly

A：我有个疑问，虽然天气渐渐趋于稳定.Translation: A: I have a question - though weather stabilizes

A：可是这些死尸却意外的越来越活跃了.Translation: A: But those zombies are more active instead

A：难道他们不应该随着季节的正常而慢慢安眠吗？.Translation: A: Shouldn't they rest as seasons normalize?

巴托莉：或许这是回光返照也说不定呢（笑）.Translation: Bartoli: Maybe it's just a final flare-up (laughs)

巴托莉：此程，我们需要打败索尼娅的姐姐.Translation: Bartoli: This time we must defeat Sonia's sister

巴托莉：我的耳目告诉我她正在进行关键的仪式，造成更大的异变.Translation: Bartoli: My sources say she's performing crucial rituals causing bigger anomalies

巴托莉：这是一个机会，届时她的力量会薄弱的可怕，也是我们打败她的最好机会.Translation: Bartoli: This is our chance - when her power weakens, we strike

B：你都懂完了，那我们队长怎么办.Translation: B: You know everything - what about our captain?

巴托莉：凌冽的冬，我最喜欢的气候.Translation: Bartoli: Bitter winter - my favorite climate

巴托莉：我来催动魔晶打开道路，你们帮我抵抗一下死尸.Translation: Bartoli: I'll activate the crystal to open path - hold off the zombies

巴托莉：穿过这道门，就是旅途的终点了，各位准备好了没有？.Translation: Bartoli: Beyond this door lies journey's end - everyone ready?

巴托莉：好机会，她的仪式应该在关键时期，击碎她的防御结晶就能强行将她唤醒.Translation: Bartoli: Perfect timing - shatter her defense crystal during ritual climax

B：交给我吧，fire in the hole！.Translation: B: Leave it to me - fire in the hole!

A：这下你的异变仪式就没法进行了吧.Translation: A: Now your anomaly ritual can't proceed

多萝斯：你们一而再再而三的阻挠我，与恶魔无异.Translation: Doros: Repeated interference makes you no better than demons

多萝斯：就让你们与这些死尸一起长眠吧！.Translation: Doros: Sleep forever with these corpses!

A：好像有点不对……巴托莉，这家伙不是坏人吗？怎么成了神明？.Translation: A: Something's wrong... Bartoli, wasn't she the villain? How's she a deity?

巴托莉：情况紧急没时间解释了，不要听她妖言惑众，击败她的最好时机来了！.Translation: Bartoli: No time to explain - don't listen to her lies! Strike now!

A:摧毁世界? 她不才是引发这场异变的罪魁祸首吗?.Translation: A: Destroy the world? Wasn't she the cause?

巴托莉:既然事情已经到了这个地步了,我也没有必要藏着掖着了.Translation: Bartoli: Since things have come to this, no need for pretense

巴托莉:你以为的异变只是她们为了停息尸潮的手段.Translation: Bartoli: What you thought was anomaly was their method to stop the undead

巴托莉:真正的异变其实是我!.Translation: Bartoli: The true anomaly is ME!

巴托莉:当我深入研究了亡灵魔法之后我才明白.Translation: Bartoli: Only through necromantic studies did I understand

巴托莉:力量的终点是生死之间.Translation: Bartoli: Power's culmination lies between life and death

巴托莉:现在我已经掌握了死亡的力量.Translation: Bartoli: Now I command death's power

巴托莉:而生的力量就在这四季轮回之间.Translation: Bartoli: Life's power resides in seasonal cycles

巴托莉:现在的我才是真正的神明!.Translation: Bartoli: Now I am the true deity!

巴托莉:就让你们成为我登神的踏脚石!.Translation: Bartoli: Become stepping stones for my ascension!

A:成神?有点意思,让我看看你的实力!.Translation: A: Godhood? Interesting - show me your power!

B:你只有这点实力吗?.Translation: B: Is this all you've got?

最后,巴托莉停止了思考,你们又一次维护了世界的秩序.Translation: Finally, Bartoli ceased thinking - you've preserved world order once more

A zombie has picked up Electrical Ring.Translation: A zombie has picked up Electrical Ring

A zombie has picked up Collecter magic.Translation: A zombie has picked up Collecter magic

A zombie has picked up gravity magic.Translation: A zombie has picked up gravity magic

一位玩家拾取了[铭月的应急医疗].Translation: 一位玩家拾取了[铭月的应急医疗]
